name: Marble Football
description:
Enjoy this simple but addictive football game where you can play with your friends.

Features:

- instant fun

- two player mode (vs. computer soon...)

- 39 teams from all over the world

- different team stats

- four team formations

- two pitch types

- earthquake button!

- free on PC (ad-free android version)

(made with Godot engine:)
